DOC.brief_summary: This registry design assess clinically relevant benefit balloon angioplasty stenting superficial femoral popliteal artery , use rapid exchange technology .
DOC.detailed_description: This registry design assess clinically relevant benefit balloon angioplasty stenting superficial femoral popliteal artery , use rapid exchange technology
DOC.criteria: Patients symptomatic one two leg ischemia , require treatment SFA popliteal artery Rutherford classification 25 Single lesion recoiling/dissection/restenosis balloon angioplasty de novo lesion stenosis occlusion , Target vessel reference diameter ≥4mm ≤7mm ( visual estimate ) At least one patent ( le 50 % stenosis ) tibioperoneal runoff vessel confirm baseline angiography Patient suitable candidate femoralpopliteal artery bypass surgery Female childbearing potential . Previous bypass surgery In stent restenosis target lesion Scheduled staged procedure multiple lesion within ipsilateral iliac popliteal artery within 30 day index procedure . Coexisting aneurysmal disease abdominal aorta , iliac popliteal artery Acute thrombophlebitis deep venous thrombosis Hemodynamic instability Untreated inflow disease ipsilateral pelvic artery ( 50 percent stenosis occlusion ) , Significant gastrointestinal bleeding coagulopathy would contraindicate use antiplatelet therapy Known intolerance study medication , contrast agent nitinol .
